content:
Why can't I have a pages only IG that doesn't have any resources
(besides the ig.xml) ? 

Load hl7.fhir.core-3.4.0 package from /Users/ehaas/.fhir/packages/hl7.fhir.core-current (01.0985sec)
Load Terminology Cache from /Users/ehaas/Documents/FHIR/Davinci-R4/generated_output/txCache (29.0642sec)
Connect to Terminology Server at http://tx.fhir.org/r4                           (29.0654sec)
-tx: Connect to http://tx.fhir.org/r4
Publishing Content Failed: You must provide a list of resources in the json file (30.0532sec)
                                                                                 (30.0533sec)
Use -? to get command line help
I don't know - but can you use an empty list?
I can easily add in resources ... I am curious why this is a build error
Because it's not a FHIR IG if it doesn't contain any FHIR?
smart launch was a FHIR without any resources. ( added some extensions now) but before. So I going to push back on that. I think it could be just pages.
If it's just pages, just create a static website - or a PDF. No reason for the IGPublisher
The ig pub is just a fancy a static website tool.
and its really been a nuisance for me starting up a new IG....
... i want to start with pages and add the profiles later
That's a rule I imposed more as a error detection mechanism, since people tell me that they want intelligent error messages not bizarre fails
I've just turned it into a warning
